Name: Meet and Greet
Description: End your Turn on a Player

Name: Learning the Ropes
Description: Use 10 items

Name: Architect
Description: Create/Place 3 Buildings

Name: Multitasker
Description: Use an Item, Hazard, and Building in 1 Turn

Name: Nasty Preparations
Description: Create/Place 5 Hazards

Name: Going up the Tiers
Description: Use a T1, T2, T3 item within a single Turn.

Name: Not enough Explosions
Description: Use 5 Temporary Creation items (using a Mortar counts).

Name: Power of Luck
Description: Apply 2 "Constants" and "Rerolls" on the same Turn. (Does NOT include Move Dice Reroll)

Name: Ramp in Power
Description: Use a T0, T1, T2, T3 and T4 (ability) items within a single Turn.

Name: Bounty Hunting
Description: Steal 30 Gold from a Target in 1 Turn

Name: Speedrunner
Description: Move 30 Spaces across the Board in 1 Turn

Name: King of the Tile
Description: End your turn on Space X

Name: Beat and Greet
Description: Steal something from a Player and End your Turn on the same Space as them.

Name: Second Life
Description: Reach the End Twice in 1 Turn

Name: Improvised Gunslinger
Description: Use 3 Unique Line of Sight Items in 1 Turn

Name: Fail Compilation
Description: Trigger 4 Hazards in 1 Turn

Name: Guardian Angel
Description: Save a Target from a Hazard 3 Times

Name: Run it Back
Description: Start 3 Turns on the same Row

Name: Master of Null
Description: Use 4 T0 items within a single Turn.

Name: Rush to Riches
Description: Gain 50 Gold in 1 Turn

Name: Darkness is Beautiful
Description: Start a Turn with every Player in the Spatial Hallway.

Name: Tying up Knots
Description: Use 10 Unique items in 1 Turn

Name: He Strikes Again
Description: Pass the same Player 4 times within a single Turn.

Name: Everything is NOT Fine
Description: Have 5 Unique Curses at the same time.
